Class TCPStream

    • lib.TCPStream

  • public class TCPStream
extends java.lang.Object

      Creates an instance of TCPStream as a client.

      • TCPStream

        public TCPStream(java.lang.String host,
         int port)
        Creates an instance of TCPStream as a client.
        Parameters:
        host - a string containing the ip address or hostname of the server
        port - an integer containing the port number to connect to

      • TCPStream

        public TCPStream(int port)
        Creates an instance of TCPStream as a server.
        Parameters:
        port - an integer containing the port number to bind to

    • Method Detail

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Returns the state of the TCPStream.
        Returns:
        true if the socket is open, false otherwise

      • dispatchDataListener

        protected void dispatchDataListener(java.lang.String data)
        Dispatches the data event for all listeners with given data. Not a public method.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to send to event handlers

      • dispatchErrorListener

        protected void dispatchErrorListener(java.lang.String message)
        Dispatches the error event for all listeners with given error message. Not a public method.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to send to event handlers
